meanings.sent1: The tricar zoomed down the street.

meanings.definition: To ride or drive a tricar.
meanings.sent1: I tricar to work every day.

meanings.sent3: He tricared through the countryside with a smile.
meanings.sent5: Tricaring through the city streets is exciting.

meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements.
